import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
